      • Public Sub SetColumnAccessOnTable(ByVal strAccessDetails As String, ByVal lngColumnAccessTableId As Long)

        Public Sub SetColumnAccessOnTable(ByVal strAccessDetails As String, ByVal lngColumnAccessTableId As Long)
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : SetColumnAccessOnTable
        '* Description : Calls Servlet and pass details to Set Column Access on Table.
        '* After successful setting of Column it refresh the column access settings for cuboid
        '* Created : 02-22-2015 20:06
        '* Modified: 02-22-2015 20:06
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

      • Public Sub SetColumnAccessPropertyBeforeSave(ByVal strPropertyGroup As String, ByVal strColumn As String, ByVal strRelation As String, ByRef strAccess As String)

        Public Sub SetColumnAccessPropertyBeforeSave(ByVal strPropertyGroup As String, ByVal strColumn As String, ByVal strRelation As String, ByRef strAccess As String)
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : SetColumnAccessPropertyBeforeSave
        '* Description : Set Column Access setting before saving into offset 1 column in tab.
        '* For Read, Write, None setting, strAccess is not Changed. for Undo, strAccess is returned by reference as Original value
        '* Created : 02-25-2015 15:30
        '* Modified: 02-25-2015 15:30
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

      • Public Sub SetCuboidColumnAccess(ByVal strAccess As String)

        Public Sub SetCuboidColumnAccess(ByVal strAccess As String)
        Details:

        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
        '* Sub/Fn : SetCuboidColumnReadonly
        '* Description : Call macros to Save changed access before Save and color that column cells interior with different pattern
        '* strAccess = R: readonly, W: Write , N: Hidden, U: Undo
        '* Created : 02-24-2015 17:04
        '* Modified: 02-24-2015 17:04
        '* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
